Player History
Drafted in 13th round, 194th overall pick, by Boston in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2015, off Ferdy Rosales (SEA)...
Injured on 4/2/2015 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Hit first career homerun on 4/20/2015, off William Lisk (BRO)...
Was selected to the 2015 Allstar game...
1/31/2016: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,071,429 through salary arbitration...
1/31/2017: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,292,857 through salary arbitration...
Won Gold Glove at Second Base in 2017...
1/31/2018: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,764,286 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/7/2018, hitting .550 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis (B) on 2/7/2019 to a 5-year deal worth $4,025,000 per year...
Drove in 6 runs against Houston on 4/28/2019...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/1/2019, hitting .524 with 0 HR, 6 RBI...
Drove in 7 runs against Kansas City on 8/17/2019...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Seattle on 9/25/2019...
Won Player of the Week award on 10/2/2019, hitting .542 with 1 HR, 9 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Brooklyn on 6/2/2020...
Injured on 8/30/2020 with a Inflamed Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 3-4 weeks...
Won World Series with St. Louis (B) in 2021...
Traded from St. Louis (B) to Philadelphia on 3/2/2022 (Going to SLB: P Kenneth Aldana, SS Brian Navarrete, P Ronald Tostado. Going to PHI: P Bruce Yearwood, 3B Salomon Cobo)...
Signed as a free agent by San Francisco on 2/15/2024 to a 2-year deal worth $8,500,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 4/1/2026 to a minor league deal...
Retired in 2028.
Returns from retirement in 2031.
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 2/25/2031 to a 1-year deal worth $500,000 per year...
